aka: Herligt er Livet i Engadin(丹麦)
Los diablos de la cumbre(西班牙)

cast.name: 哈拉尔德·赖因尔 Harald Reinl

writer.name: 阿诺尔德·范克 Arnold Fanck
Ludwig von Wohl Ludwig von Wohl

trans_title: Herligt er Livet i Engadin(丹麦)
Los diablos de la cumbre(西班牙)
introduction: Hella (Hella Hartwich) is having trouble with her fiancee Harry (Arnold Hasenclever). Because he has more of the hots for winter sports than for Hella, she feels neglected. The engagement is ended, but Hella doesn't want to give up on him quite that easily. Her remedy? To remold herself into a sportswoman, so Harry will take notice of her. With the help of two ski bums from Hamburg (Guzzi Lantschner & Walter Riml), she gets so good, she's able to enter a masters' tournament.
